raw_body: FERNANDO – LAKSIRI – It is with great sorrow we announce the death of Laksiri Fernando (Past President & long standing Treasurer of Moratuwa Arts Forum (MAF)),​ beloved husband of Stephanie,​ much loved father of Nadinka and Anoushka,​ dearest father-in-law of Rashad,​ loving grandfather of Aanjali and Minuk,​ cherished brother of Lilangani and late Lakshini and dearest brother-in-law of Rohan,​ Lakdasa,​ Joe,​ Carlo,​ Angelo,​ late Cecelia and Flavia. Remains lie at residence,​ ‘Elrinda’,​ 120/​3,​ De Soysa Road,​ Rawatawatte,​ Moratuwa. Cortege leaves residence on Wednesday,​ 11th October 2023 at 3.30 pm,​ for Service and Burial at Queen of Angel’s Church,​ Rawatawatte at 4.00 pm.064898
